gogLoginCode.description: The code you received after logging in (consult the README.md for more information). Be fast, this code is only valid for one minute. If you don't start the script within that time, it will not be able to generate an access token from it.

refreshToken.description: If you have used the script within the last hour, enter the generated refreshToken here to avoid having to log in again. Refresh tokens are valid for 60 minutes. After this, you will have to log in again.
